titleStmt.title: The meaning of the Revelation, or, A paraphrase with questions on the Revelation of the Holy Apostle and Evangelist John the Divine in which the synchronisms of Mr. Joseph Mede, and the expositions of other interpreters are called in question, and a new exposition given of the prophecies of the revelation, never heard of before, nor extant in any author whatsoever, from the sixth chapter to the eighteenth, with variety of reasons for the exposition / by Richard Hayter ...
titleStmt.author: Hayter, Richard, 1611?-1684.
Mede, Joseph, 1586-1638. Clavis apocalyptica.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.R. for John Williams ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
